t: A song of ascents. Of David.
How*pn delightfully good when*ln brothers live together in harmony!
It*ln is like fine oil on the head, running*ln down on the beard, running*ln down Aaron’s beard onto*ln his robes.
It*ln is like the dew of Hermon falling*ln on the mountains of Zion. For*ln there the Lord*s has appointed the blessing — life*ln forevermore.
